alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Crockett; Gibson; Henry; Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 8:19PM CDT until May 21 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Crockett County in west Tennessee... Weakley County in west Tennessee... Gibson County in west Tennessee... Southeastern Obion County in west Tennessee... Northwestern Carroll County in west Tennessee... West central Henry County in west Tennessee... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 819 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cloverdale to near Eaton to near Forked Deer, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Martin, Humboldt, Milan, McKenzie, Trenton, Dresden, Alamo, Dyer, Greenfield, Gleason, Troy, Kenton, Rutherford, Obion, Bradford, Sharon, Atwood, Latham, Palmersville and Eaton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Crockett; Gibson; Henry; Obion; Weakley
